parameters.name: y
parameters.text: the y dimension value of single cell embedding result

parameters.name: vx
parameters.text: the dimension x of the velocity embedding result

parameters.name: vy
parameters.text: the dimension y of the velocity embedding result

parameters.name: class
parameters.text: the cluster label of each corresponding single cells

plot_velocity.title: plot single cells RNA velocity scatter

deconv_spatial.details: the generated expression matrix object could be save as csv matrix by use the function ``geneExpression::write.expr_matrix`` from the GCModeller package.

parameters.name: expr_mat
parameters.text: a dataframe object or a GCModeller expression matrix object, the matrix object should be in format of spatial spot in rows and the gene features in columns.

parameters.name: n_layers
parameters.text: an integer value for specific the cell layer class number

parameters.name: top_genes
parameters.text: set the number of top genes when export the expression matrix in each cell layers

parameters.name: n_threads
parameters.text: default null means controls the thread number for parallel sampling via the r environment config: ``getOption("n_threads")``.

deconv_spatial.returns: A tuple list object that contains multiple result object inside: 1. single_cells: an expression matrix object that contains the single cell data 2. deconv_spatial: an expression matrix object that contains the cell layer deconvolution result data 3. cell_layers: the cell layer composition data 4. gibbs_LDA: the result of the LDA gibbs sampling result outputs, the top features in each cell class
deconv_spatial.title: Make spatial matrix deconvolution

single_nmf.title: Non-negative Matrix Factorization (NMF) on single cells data

parameters.name: x
parameters.text: the x axis for draw a pie, could be x scan location of the spatial data or x dimension of the single cells umap embedding result.

parameters.name: y
parameters.text: the y axis for draw a pie, could be y scan location of the spatial data or y dimension of the single cells umap embedding result.

vae_embedding.title: create single cell matrix embedding via VAE
